title: Square <I<Ding<I> (Ritual Food Vessel)
description: The decor of bodied t\'ao-t\'ieh and beaked dragons is in rounded relief on a ground of squared spirals. Eight flanges divide the vessl into eight panels. T\'ao-t\'ieh masks and a flange appear at the tops ofthe four cylindrical legs. The upright handles are decorated with spirals on the outer surface. Patina pale green, red patches.
